title: Live from Ohio Democratic Debate
itunes:title: Live from Ohio Democratic Debate
description:
Kevin spoke with Adam Green, Co-Founder of the Progressive Change Campaign Committee, Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg News Lead 2020 campaign Politics Editor, Adrienne Watson, War Room Director for the DNC.

Kevin broadcasts live from the Democratic debate in Columbus, Ohio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
